line.comment: * if we have no main batteries and just turrets we can keep moving around during in-sector combat (also see !ship.signal.attacked)
* Intel mission. The global var is managed in Mayhem.Monitor.Missions.
* [THIS]-> interrupt task 0 with script '!fight.attack.object' and priority 99: arg1=[PLAYERSHIP] arg2=[TRUE] arg3=[FALSE] arg4=1800
* Zero Hour 1.8 - for the player its not illegal to carry Space Weed, etc.
* [THIS]-> interrupt task 0 with script '!fight.attack.object' and priority 99: arg1=$target arg2=[FALSE] arg3=[FALSE] arg4=0
* [THIS]-> interrupt task 0 with script '!fight.attack.object' and priority 99: arg1=$target arg2=[FALSE] arg3=[FALSE] arg4=0
* ZH 1.9 - Terraformer ships do not attack Xenon type ships
* ZH 1.9 - Terraformer ships do not attack Xenon type ships

sval.val: if we have no main batteries and just turrets we can keep moving around during in-sector combat (also see !ship.signal.attacked)
Intel mission. The global var is managed in Mayhem.Monitor.Missions.
[THIS]-> interrupt task 0 with script '!fight.attack.object' and priority 99: arg1=[PLAYERSHIP] arg2=[TRUE] arg3=[FALSE] arg4=1800
